title: Son of Rosemary
description: Rosemary's Baby chilled readers with its darkly brilliant story of modern-day witchcraft - a masterpiece of suspense, completely terrifying, and completely believable. Now Ira Levin returns to take us on a spellbinding new journey into darkness...It is the dawn of a new millennium. A time when human hope is shadowed by fear and uncertainty. When a mother is about to be reunited with her son. And when a world in need of a savior will discover a new reason to be afraid.
author: Ira Levin
